description:
Going on the justification that if Ken spared his life, he couldn`t be that bad of a guy, Bat accepts Ein`s invitation to join forces, and the two capture an area by themselves. But that would lead to tragedy, as the commander of the area they captured, Beron, abducts Ein`s girl, Asuka, in vengeance. Ein`s "lady love" turns out to be a little girl! What is their relation? And what is Ein`s reason for fighting?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Ayaushi! Ai Suru Onna ni Ma no Te ga Nobita
Ein est en danger. Le diable a mis la main sur sa bien-aimée.
Ein in Danger! Hands of Evil Reach for His Love!!
アイン危うし! 愛する女に魔の手が伸びた!
